#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

long int decimal(string no,int base)
{
	int l = no.length();
	int x = l;
    long int ans = 0;
	while(x--)
	{
		ans+=pow(base,l-x-1)*(int(no[x])-48);
	}
    return ans;
}

int main() 
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	
	long int dec;
	
	string no;
	int base;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>no>>base;
		
		dec = decimal(no,base);
		
		cout<<char(dec);
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
